Python 3.8:
python -m pip install --no-index --no-cache-dir pytorch3d -f https://dl.fbaipublicfiles.com/pytorch3d/packaging/wheels/py38_cu117_pyt1131/download.html

Python 3.10:
python -m pip install --no-index --no-cache-dir pytorch3d -f https://dl.fbaipublicfiles.com/pytorch3d/packaging/wheels/py310_cu117_pyt1131/download.html
